text_block_list.text:
I've made up my mind. 
Today is the day I will scout Transcend.

Tray-chan, Tray-chan! That pen you have... It's from 
that crowdfunder! Now we match, heck yeah!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
It's so useful, right? 
It works on your phone too and it's so accurate.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Ah, you brought hot chocolate today? And the snacks... 
Ooh! I've seen these starting to blow up online. 
They'll be sold out in no-time.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Our relation is still the same as it has been. 
I'm afraid I've grown too accustomed to this atmosphere. 
It's making it hard for me to bring it up...
I know this is supposed to be my job, and I shouldn't have to worry about it so much...
I just think she might refuse...

It feels like she's just here to help me look for girls 
to scout. Not once has she tried to present herself 
to me as a potential...

You seem tired, Tray-chan... 
Too much research lately?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes... In that case... 
Why don't I energize you with some info I got recently 
about a girl with crazy potential!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I take a deep breath to clear my mind. 
Even though I fear getting rejected, the regret of 
not scouting her might be worse...

Hmm? 
Or perhaps... You already found your pick?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Or are you still thinking about it? Look, how about 
you just listen to me. My info won't disappoint.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I was about to be ready to tell her and not regret it... 
But without thinking, I went along with her sudden 
pushy request and nodded in agreement.

Perfect. Now, about her... 
Actually, it'd be better if you went to see in person.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
She told me to meet her in front of the dorms. 
When I arrived—
Ah, there you are!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Well, I'd stand out in the school's uniform. 
Now, come with me!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
She brought me to a vintage café. 
... This special umamusume is supposed to be here?

Great atmosphere, right? Did you know, 
this place has a mystery menu at certain times of day?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
It doesn't taste bad, but the ingredients are secret. 
If you wanna find out, we can try it together sometime.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I've been looking around, but there are no other 
umamusume in the café. I tilt my head in confusion.

Now, now. No need to rush. 
The day's still young.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Next, she took me to... an amusement park?! 
And still, no sign of any other umamusume.

You may think this is yet another 
attraction at first glance.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
But actually, there's a secret store inside it! 
It's invite-only, and you'll be able to find the world's first—
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: Hmm?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: <size=40>Is this part of the info you promised me?</size>

text_block_list.text:
Yep, that's right. 
Info about her interests... Her favorite places to go...
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
...... 
Now, let's get a move on!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: She took me to several other places.

All of them were interesting places. 
Places which all remind me of one girl in particular...
It was impossible not to notice.

Transcend. 
The time we spent together... 
Relaxed, like close friends.

She was merely there to help me with her info. 
Scouting her wasn't on my mind for so long...

But over time, her running, her way of thinking... 
I realized she might be the treasure I had been looking for.

... She returned to me the courage that I had lost. 
I slap my cheeks to gather it.

Did you know they found a new species of flower here? 
It's not been announced publicly yet, but there's 
a picture of it at the reception.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Ooh? I've never seen that flower before! 
Isn't it lovely? Gonna have to look that one up later.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
... So, Tray-chan. 
Did looking at the flowers help you relax?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I guess she noticed how nervous I am... 
I cough to clear my throat, and lift my head.
choice_data_list: I found the girl I want to scout.

text_block_list.text:
Oho? Who is it? 
I'm sure I'll have info on her.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: It comes at a price, of course!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
To answer the question, I tell her the girl seems calm 
at first glance, but she has a keen eye for data 
and can be a little cheeky.

I think she's awfully kind and considerate on the inside. 
At least, that's what she seems like to me.
Hey now, I'm supposed to be the one to give you that kind of info. It must've rubbed off on you.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
With that witty remark, she averts her gaze. 
I try to step into it on purpose and try to continue 
our conversation.

If I were to scout her, we would be working together 
to reach the race of our dreams. An unknown world, 
thrilling beyond any expectations.

That which could never be contained by imagination... 
She would make it possible to achieve.

...... 
I might know... a thing or two about that girl.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
...She says with a sly grin. 
I return a grin of my own.
choice_data_list: I'd like to buy that info from you.

text_block_list.text:
Heh... Sure, but that girl might be a lot more of a handful 
than all the others you've looked at. 
Think you can take her on?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: I nodded as to say "of course". I haven't seen her eyes sparkle with this much joy before.
I'll start with some advice. If you want to succeed in scouting her, she's gonna need some info about you, Tray-chan.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
She needs to know what kind of person you are. 
How about it?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Yep, let's go back and get some tea and snacks! 
I'll help you out this time. That's only fair.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Also, I think we'll need more time than normal today. 
Do you think you can handle it?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: I expect some invaluable info from you today!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
